overview:
Jamie is a currently the Chief Operating Officer for C2 Education. C2 Education is the nation’s fastest growing network of school subject tutoring, SAT/ACT/PSAT/SSAT test prep, tutor, and educational support centers. C2 Education offers personal tutoring in nearly any subject area, from algebra tutoring to English tutoring, from PSAT prep to AP test help. www.c2educate.com

Prior to this role Jamie spent just under 6 years with Kaplan Test Prep and Admissions. Most of this time was spent as the Territory Vice President. In this position he led and was responsible for the field operations and P&L performance for the Northeast Territory including three of the company’s most critical markets (Washington D.C., Philadelphia, and Boston) as well as operations in Europe, Middle East, and Africa including Kaplan locations in London and Paris.

Other career highlights for Jamie include 6 years with MBNA America Bank as an Assistant Vice President in various strategic, data analytic, and leadership roles after beginning his professional career as a US Army officer.

Jamie is a graduate of the United States Military Academy, West Point and has his MBA from the University of Delaware.

http://www.linkedin.com/in/jamieadavidson
